data.name: Acid Trip
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Acid Trip!


ACID TRIP is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and skull-crushing close combat and defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.


KILL, destroy, fuck up zombies. Oh, and look good to your friends by smashing their scores on the leaderboards.

STORY:

You‚Äôve come here for a reason. they are to friends working on new year eve so one of them put acid in candy üç¨ and they took it without knowing so they took an overdose and the hungover started the game take place in their mind tripping and making them imagine they are in a zombie apocalypse and If they die in there mind they die in the real world.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Back-Breaking , Challenging Gameplay

  • purchase Perks and upgrades to Kill, destroy, fuck up zombies more brutality!!!

  • Endless Possibilities and a variety of powerups

  • Fast-paced gameplay that will make the bones in your hands shatter!!!

  • Leaderboards to prove you're better than the rest of the world, or at least your friends!

  • Dodge, shoot, and destroy 8 challenging multi-form bosses

  • Intense sound design with gurgling zombies and all that shit!

  • Intense Musical Accompaniment

data.short_description: Acid Trip is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and Back-Breaking, Challenging Gameplay defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.
data.reviews:
‚ÄúIf you are a high-scorer player this is your game, shoot endless hordes of enemies and try to kill them in several ways to get more points, You could argue that ACID TRIP is brilliant, brutal, a tactical and aesthetic masterpiece as well as a pixel-art odyssey of ice-cold violence. It is, also it's a very cheap game if you want to try something new.‚Äù
10/10 ‚Äì metacritic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with 128MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+ (2 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB), Intel HD Graphics 4400 (Shared), Radeon X1600 XT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
